problem_names: lemma initiali_aodv [intro!, simp]: "initiali i (init (opaodv i)) (init (paodv i))"
translations: lemma initiali_aodv [intro!, simp]: "initiali i (init (opaodv i)) (init (paodv i))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. initiali i (init (opaodv i)) (init (paodv i))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. initiali i
     (init
       \<lparr>init =
                 {(aodv_init,
                   \<Gamma>\<^sub>A\<^sub>O\<^sub>D\<^sub>V PAodv)},
          trans =
            oseqp_sos \<Gamma>\<^sub>A\<^sub>O\<^sub>D\<^sub>V i\<rparr>)
     (init
       \<lparr>init =
                 {(aodv_init i,
                   \<Gamma>\<^sub>A\<^sub>O\<^sub>D\<^sub>V PAodv)},
          trans = seqp_sos \<Gamma>\<^sub>A\<^sub>O\<^sub>D\<^sub>V\<rparr>)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. control_within \<Gamma>\<^sub>A\<^sub>O\<^sub>D\<^sub>V
     (init
       \<lparr>init =
                 {(aodv_init,
                   \<Gamma>\<^sub>A\<^sub>O\<^sub>D\<^sub>V PAodv)},
          trans =
            oseqp_sos \<Gamma>\<^sub>A\<^sub>O\<^sub>D\<^sub>V i\<rparr>)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<sigma>, p)
    \<in> \<sigma>\<^sub>A\<^sub>O\<^sub>D\<^sub>V' \<Longrightarrow>
    labels \<Gamma>\<^sub>A\<^sub>O\<^sub>D\<^sub>V p = {PAodv-:0}

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<sigma>, p)
    \<in> {(aodv_init,
            \<Gamma>\<^sub>A\<^sub>O\<^sub>D\<^sub>V
             PAodv)} \<Longrightarrow>
    labels \<Gamma>\<^sub>A\<^sub>O\<^sub>D\<^sub>V p = {PAodv-:0}

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<sigma>, p)
    \<in> \<sigma>\<^sub>A\<^sub>O\<^sub>D\<^sub>V' \<Longrightarrow>
    kD (rt (\<sigma> i)) = {}

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<sigma>, p)
    \<in> {(aodv_init,
            \<Gamma>\<^sub>A\<^sub>O\<^sub>D\<^sub>V
             PAodv)} \<Longrightarrow>
    {dip. rt (\<sigma> i) dip \<noteq> None} = {}

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<sigma>, p)
    \<in> \<sigma>\<^sub>A\<^sub>O\<^sub>D\<^sub>V' \<Longrightarrow>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<sigma>, p)
    \<in> {(aodv_init,
            \<Gamma>\<^sub>A\<^sub>O\<^sub>D\<^sub>V
             PAodv)} \<Longrightarrow>
    {dip. flag (rt (\<sigma> i)) dip = Some val} = {}

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. automaton.trans (opaodv i) =
    oseqp_sos \<Gamma>\<^sub>A\<^sub>O\<^sub>D\<^sub>V i
